definitions.title: n.pr.loc. 1.
definitions.body: in the Shephelah of Judah Jos 15:34, perh. Umm-ǧîna, c. 1 mile S. of W. from Bethshemesh Cl-Gann Buhl:Geogr.194 f.

in Issachar Jos 19:21 (A. Hngannim), Levit. city Jos 21:29 (phgh\n gramma/twn); hence by txt. err. [[עָנֵם]] 1Ch 6:58; Ǧennin, near SE. end of plain of Jezreel, c. 15 m. NNE. fr. Samaria, Buhl:Geogr.202
